title: Vizhi Veekura Song Lyrics in Tamil
stanzas:
Naala naalum nillama neeli
suthikichu suthikichu
Polladha paarvai pallala pesa
sokki kichu sokka vechale Ya, yaaro

Karaicha karayila kanna thedi kaathirukka
kalicha kaadhala ketu varava
Naan ketu varava
naan ketu varava
naan kaaththa irava, tharava

Vizhi veekuraa verum vaarthaiyaa
variyaakki nee vaasikkira
Vazhi maathini nee enna vaattura
vinnukulla un vaakkula-ae

Unnoda konja neram
unna naan konja venum
unnala nenju paayum
unna paarkaiyila

Anju naalum unna kenji naalum
enna nenchila nenchila
enna mella vachcha iravula

kanne enna konjam kaathaa
kaadhal minjum kaettaa
kotti tharuven naane

Hey raasa rendu sollil lesa
sikka vechu ..
enna sokka vechu poraane

Unnala naalum nillama neeli
suthikichu suthikichu
Polladha paarvai pallala pesa
sokki kichu sokki kichu

Naala naalum nillama needi
suthikichu suthikichu
Polladha paarvai pallala pesa
sokki kichu sokka vechale Ya, yaaro

Karaicha karayila kanna thedi kaathirukka
kalicha kaadhala ketu varava
Naan ketu varava
naan ketu varava
naan kaaththa irava, tharava

Vizhi veekuraa verum vaarthaiyaa
variyaakki nee vaasikkira
Vazhi maathini nee enna vaattura
vinnukulla un vaakkula-ae

Unnoda konja neram
unna naan konja venum
unnala nenju paayum
unna paarkaiyila

Anju naalum unna kenji naalum
enna nenchila nenchila
enna mella vachcha iravula
